archimate:BusinessService.name: Customer Profile
archimate:BusinessService.documentation:
Example of use:
The identity and active status of a customer is checked as they present themselves on-line to access their bank account
General comment:
The role of this service domain will be ratified in later versions of the landscape
Business Purpose : Maintain a small amount of current customer status data to identify and influence any real-time operational interaction for sales, servicing and/or fulfillment (e.g. high value, eligible for campaign, account suspended, open Case)
Пример использования:
Личность и активный статус клиента проверяется, как они представляют себя в интернете, чтобы получить доступ к своему банковскому счету
Общее замечание:
Роль этого домена услуг будет утверждена в более поздних версиях ландшафта
деловая цель : Поддерживать небольшой объем текущих данных о состоянии клиентов, чтобы идентифицировать и влиять на любое оперативное взаимодействие в режиме реального времени для продаж, обслуживания и/или выполнения (например, высокая стоимость, право на кампанию, приостановленный счет, открытое дело)
Service Domain - Customer Profile The customer profile service domain is used to tune the customer experience during any real-time interaction with the bank. A collection of status indicators, ratings and alerts can be maintained that are then used to influence the routing and servicing decisions that govern the customer interaction. For example a status indicator could include a warning that the account is in distress which would limit sales activity and might result in routing a contact to a specialist account recovery servicing facility
Detailed Summary This service domain maintains a small profile of key indicators for a customer that is referenced during customer interactions to facilitate routing, servicing and product/service fulfillment decisions. This can include status (such as account in arrears), ratings (such as high value customer) and alerts (such possible fraud activity detected)
Executive Summary This service domain maintains a small profile of key indicators for a customer that is referenced during customer interactions to facilitate routing, servicing and product/service fulfillment decisions. This can include status, ratings and alerts
Examples Of Use The identity and active status of a customer is checked as they present themselves on-line to access their bank account
